name: UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle
desc: The button style your app uses when running in macOS.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The button has a style that matches other content in the button configuration.

items.name: case bordered
items.desc: The button has a bordered style.

items.name: case borderless
items.desc: The button has a borderless style.

items.name: case borderlessTinted
items.desc: The button has a tinted, bordlerless style.

items.name: static func == (UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle, UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button styles are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle, UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button styles are not equal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the button style by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the button style.
